title: Jose Antonio Vargas | Tommy Orange
description:
Seth welcomes activist Jose Antonio Vargas, who shares his story about being an undocumented immigrant and explains what politicians get wrong about immigration.

After that, Seth interviews author Tommy Orange, who also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G exclusively for the podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
